detailed_profile.name: Sameer Rakheja
detailed_profile.position: Walmart || Zerodha || Groww || HR Operations Specialist at Walmart || Employee-Centric Payroll Solutions || Building Lasting Relationships || Driving Client Value & Growth
detailed_profile.about: I am an HR Operations professional currently contributing to Walmart's Payroll Management team. My focus is on delivering accurate, compliant, and positive payroll experiences for employees. This includes managing end-to-end payroll operations, resolving discrepancies, and overseeing data dissemination and reporting to optimize operational efficiency. I'm committed to continuous improvement, actively training and upskilling in advanced payroll technologies, including PayActiv, Gen AI, and Workday Integration, to enhance automation and precision. I hold a Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, which provides a strong foundation in business principles and practices. Prior to Walmart, I gained valuable experience in client service and operations during a year at Groww Investment Technologies, where I provided investment guidance and client support. I also served as an Assistant Manager at Zerodha Broking Limited, specializing in quality assurance, derivatives, and market indices. My background also includes experience in customer engagement and marketing, honed through roles at Bronze Salon and Spa and Settl Co-Living Spaces, where I developed skills in customer relations and content creation.

experience.title: Associate Specialist - HR Operations
experience.description:
At Walmart, I manage end-to-end payroll operations, ensuring accuracy, compliance, and a smooth experience for employees. I handle discrepancies, streamline reporting, and help drive efficiency across HR processes.


To improve payroll quality, I regularly upskill and work with tools like PayActiv, Gen AI, and Workday Integration, bringing in automation and precision to support both operational excellence and employee satisfaction.

matched.match_rationale: Mrinmoy Mishra specializes in SEO and Digital Marketing at Groww, which aligns closely with Jaya Yadav's expertise in Digital Marketing, SEO, and Content Marketing.

detailed_profile.name: Mrinmoy Mishra
detailed_profile.about: Results-driven SEO Specialist with 1.5+ years of experience in technical SEO, on-page and off-page optimization, and content strategy. Proven track record of increasing organic traffic and keyword rankings for fintech and product-based companies. My passion lies in building SEO strategies that don’t just chase rankings but drive measurable business outcomes — revenue, conversions, and long-term brand authority. I lead the end-to-end SEO strategy and execution for five high-impact categories, collaborating closely with the CMO, app optimization agencies, developers, and content teams. My approach is rooted in data-driven decision making, integrating technical excellence with content strategy and UX alignment to maximize organic performance. Proven results: Increased organic revenue by 15.13% within just 30 days Achieved a 12.94% boost in conversion on a focused in-house SEO initiative Consistently deliver scalable improvements in traffic quality and lead generation Core strengths & tools: Technical SEO audits, Core Web Vitals optimization & structured data implementation Content mapping aligned to user intent and funnel stages Advanced keyword strategy, on-page optimization, schema markup GSC, GA4, Screaming Frog, SEMrush, Ahrefs, GTM, Google Ads What differentiates me is a holistic, audit-led mindset: beyond crawl reports, I diagnose real growth levers — from index bloat, cannibalization, and link gap analysis to UI/UX enhancements and content opportunities. My strategies blend Generative Engine Optimization (GEO), Answer Engine Optimization (AEO), and AI-powered automation, ensuring brands stay visible in an evolving search landscape. Previously, I’ve worked with high-traffic media websites, B2B SaaS, and local SEO clients, growing organic traffic from thousands to millions per month and increasing revenue exponentially. I thrive at the intersection of SEO, user experience, and business strategy, translating complex data into actionable insights that stakeholders can trust. If you’d like to connect about advanced SEO, AI-led growth strategies, or turning organic search into a predictable revenue channel — let’s talk.

detailed_profile.name: Sameer Rakheja
detailed_profile.position: Walmart || Zerodha || Groww || HR Operations Specialist at Walmart || Employee-Centric Payroll Solutions || Building Lasting Relationships || Driving Client Value & Growth
detailed_profile.about: I am an HR Operations professional currently contributing to Walmart's Payroll Management team. My focus is on delivering accurate, compliant, and positive payroll experiences for employees. This includes managing end-to-end payroll operations, resolving discrepancies, and overseeing data dissemination and reporting to optimize operational efficiency. I'm committed to continuous improvement, actively training and upskilling in advanced payroll technologies, including PayActiv, Gen AI, and Workday Integration, to enhance automation and precision. I hold a Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, which provides a strong foundation in business principles and practices. Prior to Walmart, I gained valuable experience in client service and operations during a year at Groww Investment Technologies, where I provided investment guidance and client support. I also served as an Assistant Manager at Zerodha Broking Limited, specializing in quality assurance, derivatives, and market indices. My background also includes experience in customer engagement and marketing, honed through roles at Bronze Salon and Spa and Settl Co-Living Spaces, where I developed skills in customer relations and content creation.

publications.title: Synthesizing Heap Manipulations via Integer Linear Programming
publications.subtitle: Springer
publications.description: Writing heap manipulating programs is hard. Even though the high-level algorithms may be simple, it is often tedious to express them using low-level operations. We present a new tool — Synlip — that uses expression of intent in the form of concrete examples drawn using box-and-arrow diagrams to synthesize heap-manipulations automatically. Instead of modeling the concrete examples in a monolithic manner, Synlip attempts to extract a set of patterns of manipulation that can be applied repeatedly to construct such programs. It, then, attempts to infer these patterns as linear transformations, leveraging the power of ILP solvers for program synthesis.In contrast to many current tools, Synlip does not need a bound on the number of statements and the number of temporaries to be used in the desired program. Also, it is almost insensitive to the size of the concrete examples and, thus, tends to be scalable. Synlip was found to be quite fast; it takes less than 10 seconds for most of our benchmark tasks spanning data-structures like singly and doubly linked-lists, AVL trees and binary search trees.

projects.title: Detection of COTS - Saving the Great Barrier Reef
projects.description: The aim of the project was to detect and locate COTS (Crown of Thorns Starfish) which would help environmentalists protect the corals at the Great Barrier Reef from the outbreaks in the population of COTS. detailed_profile.position: Customer Success Executive | Aspiring Equity Research Analyst | Financial Statement Analysis | Investment Strategies | Preparing Research Report | Earnings Report Analysis
detailed_profile.about: I started my career with Sharekhan as a Mutual Fund Specialist, where I developed a solid foundation in financial markets. Currently, I am working as a Senior Customer Success Executive at Groww, gaining valuable insights into Stock market and market dynamics. My interest in equity research began during my first job, fueling my passion to go deeper into the field. To build relevant skills, I recently completed an equity research cohort from The Valuation School, equipping me with expertise in financial statement analysis, valuation and industry analysis. As part of my learning journey, I have prepared a detailed equity research report, demonstrating my ability to analyze companies and market trends comprehensively. I am committed to continuously expanding my knowledge by staying updated with industry developments and improving my analytical abilities. I am keen to connect with finance professionals, exchange insights, and explore opportunities in equity research. I aspire to contribute to the field by leveraging my skills and passion for uncovering investment opportunities and delivering value-driven research.

positions.subtitle: Groww
positions.description: • Working on Trading APIs to design and develop endpoints that allow users to write their own algorithms and automate trading. • Worked on a Spring Batch pipeline that processes millions of live-data records across multiple files with chunk-oriented steps and parallel processing while ensuring data consistency and scalable performance. • Cross-Service Contributions & Collaboration Contributed critical bug fixes and feature enhancements across aggregation, auth, and subscription microservices—improving error messaging, automating email workflows for API subscriptions, and documenting system architecture for smoother onboarding. • End-to-End Refactoring of Trading API Core Service Led a comprehensive overhaul of the backend powering trading endpoints: modularized components, replaced REST clients with Feign, integrated service SDKs, applied the Factory pattern, and wrote unit tests to drive coverage above 80%—resulting in measurably faster release cycles and simplified maintenance. • Python SDK and documentation Took ownership of Python SDK documentation and code, overhauled documentation based on user feedback, and implemented clear usage examples. Built a comprehensive integration testing suite that runs daily to monitor system health, automatically alerting on any regressions or failures. • Tech Stack: Java (Spring Boot), Python, SQL
positions.title: Engineering Intern (Backend)
positions.description_html:
• Working on Trading APIs to design and develop endpoints that allow users to write their own algorithms and automate trading.

• Worked on a Spring Batch pipeline that processes millions of live-data records across multiple files with chunk-oriented steps and parallel processing while ensuring data consistency and scalable performance.

• Cross-Service Contributions & Collaboration Contributed critical bug fixes and feature enhancements across aggregation, auth, and subscription microservices—improving error messaging, automating email workflows for API subscriptions, and documenting system architecture for smoother onboarding.

• End-to-End Refactoring of Trading API Core Service Led a comprehensive overhaul of the backend
powering trading endpoints: modularized components, replaced REST clients with Feign, integrated service SDKs, applied the Factory pattern, and wrote unit tests to drive coverage above 80%—resulting in measurably faster release cycles and simplified maintenance.

• Python SDK and documentation Took ownership of Python SDK documentation and code, overhauled
documentation based on user feedback, and implemented clear usage examples. Built a comprehensive integration testing suite that runs daily to monitor system health, automatically alerting on any regressions or failures.

• Tech Stack: Java (Spring Boot), Python, SQL

experience.title: Software Engineer Intern
experience.description:
Implemented a text-to-SQL pipeline that decomposes complex cross-database Natural language queries into simpler SQL queries and aggregates the results.


Developed a natural language to chart generation pipeline, enabling users to create plots from natural language input, significantly enhancing data visualization.


Added concurrency support to APIs using context variables and locks. This allowed us to handle multiple requests at the same time without issues, making the system more efficient and reliable.


Developed a versatile endpoint manager, enabling seamless connections to multiple databases simultaneously without code changes.

Implemented a text-to-SQL pipeline that decomposes complex cross-database Natural language queries into simpler SQL queries and aggregates the results.

Developed a natural language to chart generation pipeline, enabling users to create plots from natural language input, significantly enhancing data visualization.

Added concurrency support to APIs using context variables and locks. This allowed us to handle multiple requests at the same time without issues, making the system more efficient and reliable.

projects.title: Detection of COTS - Saving the Great Barrier Reef
projects.description: The aim of the project was to detect and locate COTS (Crown of Thorns Starfish) which would help environmentalists protect the corals at the Great Barrier Reef from the outbreaks in the population of COTS. My contribution to the project was building the processing of the data and building the architecture of the neural network used to solve the problem.

projects.title: Brain Tumor Radiogenomic Classification
projects.description: The aim of the project was detection and analysis of the severity of a brain tumor by making use of MGMT values. My contribution to the project was pre-processing the data and building the architecture of the neural network used.

projects.title: Evento
projects.description: Evento was a sophisticated web application with a categorized listing of vendors and templates for event planning. My contribution to the project was building the back end of the project and connecting it to the front end, while making minor tweaks to the front end as and when required.

projects.title: Aerogreen
projects.description: Aerogreen was a project aimed at solving the real-world problem of pollution using IoT, UAVs, andArtificial Intelligence. My contributions to the project were piloting the UAV to collect data, augmenting collected data, and building a model for the detection of garbage

projects.title: Academix Store
projects.description: AcademixStore is an advanced digital library platform engineered to address the challenges of accessing semester-specific academic resources in an affordable and eco-friendly manner. Built using Android (Kotlin) for a smooth and modern mobile experience, our system seamlessly connects students to a vast repository of digital textbooks and learning materials, precisely aligned with academic curricula and requirements.Problem Addressed:Traditional academic resources are often fragmented, expensive, and environmentally unsustainable. Students face difficulties in obtaining semester-specific materials quickly and at a reasonable cost. AcademixStore solves these challenges by offering a centralized digital platform that delivers instant, affordable, and environmentally conscious access to curated academic content.Key Technical Features:📱 Developed using Kotlin on Android for optimal performance and user experience.⚙️ Integrated with secure cloud storage to provide instant delivery of digital textbooks upon purchase.💰 Flexible, affordable pricing models to fit student budgets.📚 Comprehensive subject coverage across disciplines, including science, literature, and more.🌿 Sustainable, paperless solution that aligns with eco-friendly practices.🎓 Semester-specific, curriculum-aligned resources to support focused academic success.By leveraging Kotlin and modern Android development practices, AcademixStore ensures a reliable, intuitive, and engaging learning experience for all users.

projects.title: CartTracker
projects.description: Discover the ultimate shopping companion with CartTracker. Our app helps you stay ahead of the game by keeping track of your favorite products and notifying you the moment their prices drop. Say goodbye to missing out on great deals and hello to smart shopping!Product price tracking is done at every 40mins.Key Features:🔍 Track Your Favourite Products:Easily add products using the product url copied from the shopping marketplace. Currently supports Amazon and Flipkart.📉 Real-Time Price Drop Alerts:Get instant notifications when the prices of your tracked products drop. Never miss a deal again!📱 User-Friendly Interface:Our intuitive and sleek design makes it easy to navigate and manage your tracked products. Find what you need with just a few taps.🌐 Multi-Store Support: ( In future )Track products from all your favorite online retailers in one app. Compare prices and choose the best deal available.

projects.title: MealMatcher
projects.description: Android App that helps you find best deals on Zomato and Swiggy.To craft this app, I've utilized Android development tools like Kotlin and Java. The backbone of the app relies on APIs developed using Flask, alongside web scraping tools like Scrapy, Playwright, and Selenium. These APIs fetch data from Zomato and Swiggy, enabling users to search for restaurants or dishes. Upon input, the app displays menu prices from both platforms, enriched with filters such as location, cuisine, and ratings for an enhanced user experience.

projects.title: Detection of COTS - Saving the Great Barrier Reef
projects.description: The aim of the project was to detect and locate COTS (Crown of Thorns Starfish) which would help environmentalists protect the corals at the Great Barrier Reef from the outbreaks in the population of COTS. My contribution to the project was building the processing of the data and building the architecture of the neural network used to solve the problem.

projects.title: Brain Tumor Radiogenomic Classification
projects.description: The aim of the project was detection and analysis of the severity of a brain tumor by making use of MGMT values. My contribution to the project was pre-processing the data and building the architecture of the neural network used.

projects.title: Evento
projects.description: Evento was a sophisticated web application with a categorized listing of vendors and templates for event planning. My contribution to the project was building the back end of the project and connecting it to the front end, while making minor tweaks to the front end as and when required.

projects.title: Aerogreen
projects.description: Aerogreen was a project aimed at solving the real-world problem of pollution using IoT, UAVs, andArtificial Intelligence. My contributions to the project were piloting the UAV to collect data, augmenting collected data, and building a model for the detection of garbage

I am currently studying Bachelor of Technology at Ajay Kumar Garg Engineering College and am actively seeking opportunities to gain hands-on experience in my field. In my academic pursuits, I have developed a strong foundation in DSA and problem-solving. I am constantly seeking to learn and grow, and I am always looking for new challenges and projects to tackle. Outside of the classroom, I am involved in several extracurricular activities that have allowed me to apply my knowledge and skills in a practical setting. I am a member of the Software Incubator and have worked on projects such as ShopIt (An e-commerce app) and Felix (A video streaming app). I am excited to continue my education and career in engineering, and I am eager to work with others who share my passion for solving complex problems and making a positive impact.

• Worked on a Spring Batch pipeline that processes millions of live-data records across multiple files with chunk-oriented steps and parallel processing while ensuring data consistency and scalable performance.

• Cross-Service Contributions & Collaboration Contributed critical bug fixes and feature enhancements across aggregation, auth, and subscription microservices—improving error messaging, automating email workflows for API subscriptions, and documenting system architecture for smoother onboarding.

• End-to-End Refactoring of Trading API Core Service Led a comprehensive overhaul of the backend
powering trading endpoints: modularized components, replaced REST clients with Feign, integrated service SDKs, applied the Factory pattern, and wrote unit tests to drive coverage above 80%—resulting in measurably faster release cycles and simplified maintenance.

• Python SDK and documentation Took ownership of Python SDK documentation and code, overhauled
documentation based on user feedback, and implemented clear usage examples. Built a comprehensive integration testing suite that runs daily to monitor system health, automatically alerting on any regressions or failures.

• Tech Stack: Java (Spring Boot), Python, SQL

experience.title: Software Engineer Intern
experience.description:
Implemented a text-to-SQL pipeline that decomposes complex cross-database Natural language queries into simpler SQL queries and aggregates the results.


Developed a natural language to chart generation pipeline, enabling users to create plots from natural language input, significantly enhancing data visualization.


Added concurrency support to APIs using context variables and locks. This allowed us to handle multiple requests at the same time without issues, making the system more efficient and reliable.

projects.title: Detection of COTS - Saving the Great Barrier Reef
projects.description: The aim of the project was to detect and locate COTS (Crown of Thorns Starfish) which would help environmentalists protect the corals at the Great Barrier Reef from the outbreaks in the population of COTS. My contribution to the project was building the processing of the data and building the architecture of the neural network used to solve the problem.

projects.title: Brain Tumor Radiogenomic Classification
projects.description: The aim of the project was detection and analysis of the severity of a brain tumor by making use of MGMT values. My contribution to the project was pre-processing the data and building the architecture of the neural network used.

projects.title: Evento
projects.description: Evento was a sophisticated web application with a categorized listing of vendors and templates for event planning. My contribution to the project was building the back end of the project and connecting it to the front end, while making minor tweaks to the front end as and when required.

projects.title: Aerogreen
projects.description: Aerogreen was a project aimed at solving the real-world problem of pollution using IoT, UAVs, andArtificial Intelligence. My contributions to the project were piloting the UAV to collect data, augmenting collected data, and building a model for the detection of garbage

detailed_profile.about: I started my career with Sharekhan as a Mutual Fund Specialist, where I developed a solid foundation in financial markets. Currently, I am working as a Senior Customer Success Executive at Groww, gaining valuable insights into Stock market and market dynamics. My interest in equity research began during my first job, fueling my passion to go deeper into the field. To build relevant skills, I recently completed an equity research cohort from The Valuation School, equipping me with expertise in financial statement analysis, valuation and industry analysis. As part of my learning journey, I have prepared a detailed equity research report, demonstrating my ability to analyze companies and market trends comprehensively. I am committed to continuously expanding my knowledge by staying updated with industry developments and improving my analytical abilities. I am keen to connect with finance professionals, exchange insights, and explore opportunities in equity research. I aspire to contribute to the field by leveraging my skills and passion for uncovering investment opportunities and delivering value-driven research.

positions.subtitle: RentoMojo
positions.description: - Team management: Hired, trained, and managed an in-house creative studio—catering to content, copy, design, and motion graphic requirements across the organization. - TAT & guidelines: Created and maintained a predictable TAT for deliverables with strict adherence to brand guidelines and a workflow process. - Collaboration: Maintained a monthly trackable briefing process for all stakeholders across the organization requesting any collateral from the creative team to help foresee the work pipeline and plan ahead better. - Digital marketing: Supported online campaigns with refreshing and innovative ad concepts for Facebook, Google, Instagram, LinkedIn, Youtube and other performance channels. - OOH marketing: Launched a successful OOH campaign in Hyderabad with a quick-to-consume concept that led to an increase in awareness and a hike in website traffic in Hyderabad. - Engagement: Initiated two monthly newsletters to engage our users with our latest relevant blog articles and a themed showcase of our newest product launches. - SEO and blog: Edited and reviewed every piece of SEO content, and published keyword-focused blogs—helping in making organic (as a channel) a major contributor to website traffic. - Environmental branding: Worked with the offline/retail channel team to increase awareness of RentoMojo and get potential customers to consider RMI/renting as an option instead of buying in different retails stores such as Reliance Digital. - Photoshoots: Successfully conceptualized and supervised photoshoots within a tight budget and timeline for marketing campaigns. - Partnerships: Designed brand awareness and conversion campaign ideas for various brand partnerships including Bounce, 24Seven, and Oyo. - UX and product content: Wrote and reviewed any new content for website, app, transactional emailers/SMS/pushes, IVR scripts, etc.
positions.title: Head - Creative & Content
positions.description_html:
- Team management: Hired, trained, and managed an in-house creative studio—catering to content, copy, design, and motion graphic requirements across the organization.

- TAT & guidelines: Created and maintained a predictable TAT for deliverables with strict adherence to brand guidelines and a workflow process.

- Collaboration: Maintained a monthly trackable briefing process for all stakeholders across the organization requesting any collateral from the creative team to help foresee the work pipeline and plan ahead better.

- Digital marketing: Supported online campaigns with refreshing and innovative ad concepts for Facebook, Google, Instagram, LinkedIn, Youtube and other performance channels.

- OOH marketing: Launched a successful OOH campaign in Hyderabad with a quick-to-consume concept that led to an increase in awareness and a hike in website traffic in Hyderabad.

- Engagement: Initiated two monthly newsletters to engage our users with our latest relevant blog articles and a themed showcase of our newest product launches.

- SEO and blog: Edited and reviewed every piece of SEO content, and published keyword-focused blogs—helping in making organic (as a channel) a major contributor to website traffic.

- Environmental branding: Worked with the offline/retail channel team to increase awareness of RentoMojo and get potential customers to consider RMI/renting as an option instead of buying in different retails stores such as Reliance Digital.

- Photoshoots: Successfully conceptualized and supervised photoshoots within a tight budget and timeline for marketing campaigns.

- Partnerships: Designed brand awareness and conversion campaign ideas for various brand partnerships including Bounce, 24Seven, and Oyo.

- UX and product content: Wrote and reviewed any new content for website, app, transactional emailers/SMS/pushes, IVR scripts, etc.

detailed_profile.name: Rasika More
detailed_profile.position: Customer Success Executive | Aspiring Equity Research Analyst | Financial Statement Analysis | Investment Strategies | Preparing Research Report | Earnings Report Analysis
detailed_profile.about: I started my career with Sharekhan as a Mutual Fund Specialist, where I developed a solid foundation in financial markets. Currently, I am working as a Senior Customer Success Executive at Groww, gaining valuable insights into Stock market and market dynamics. My interest in equity research began during my first job, fueling my passion to go deeper into the field. To build relevant skills, I recently completed an equity research cohort from The Valuation School, equipping me with expertise in financial statement analysis, valuation and industry analysis. As part of my learning journey, I have prepared a detailed equity research report, demonstrating my ability to analyze companies and market trends comprehensively. I am committed to continuously expanding my knowledge by staying updated with industry developments and improving my analytical abilities. I am keen to connect with finance professionals, exchange insights, and explore opportunities in equity research. I aspire to contribute to the field by leveraging my skills and passion for uncovering investment opportunities and delivering value-driven research.

publications.title: Synthesizing Heap Manipulations via Integer Linear Programming
publications.subtitle: Springer
publications.description: Writing heap manipulating programs is hard. Even though the high-level algorithms may be simple, it is often tedious to express them using low-level operations. We present a new tool — Synlip — that uses expression of intent in the form of concrete examples drawn using box-and-arrow diagrams to synthesize heap-manipulations automatically. Instead of modeling the concrete examples in a monolithic manner, Synlip attempts to extract a set of patterns of manipulation that can be applied repeatedly to construct such programs. It, then, attempts to infer these patterns as linear transformations, leveraging the power of ILP solvers for program synthesis.In contrast to many current tools, Synlip does not need a bound on the number of statements and the number of temporaries to be used in the desired program. Also, it is almost insensitive to the size of the concrete examples and, thus, tends to be scalable. Synlip was found to be quite fast; it takes less than 10 seconds for most of our benchmark tasks spanning data-structures like singly and doubly linked-lists, AVL trees and binary search trees.

projects.title: Drive2YT - Cloud-Powered Video Uploader
projects.description: Developed and deployed a robust Flask web application on Google App Engine, designed to seamlessly upload video files from Google Drive directly to YouTube. This project provided hands-on experience with end-to-end cloud application development and integration with critical Google services. Notably, this application was largely "vibe coded" with the assistance of Gemini 2.5 and Grok 3, leveraging AI for rapid prototyping, debugging, and exploring complex API interactions.

projects.title: Implementation of Six Sigma Methodologies in Machine Lab
projects.description: The Machine Lab at our college serves as an essential practical learning environment for students to master machining processes such as lathe operations. However, operational inefficiencies, high defect rates, excessive material wastage, and time management issues hinder its potential. This project introduces Six Sigma methodologies to address these challenges systematically, focusing on reducing defects by 20%, improving material efficiency by 20%, and reducing task completion time from 45 minutes to 30 minutes. Using the DMAIC (Define, Measure, Analyze, Improve, Control) framework, we identified root causes, developed targeted solutions such as training materials, optimized lab layouts, and implemented self-assessment tools. Early results indicate significant improvements, including a 22% reduction in defects and a 21% decrease in material wastage. This initiative provides a sustainable model for enhancing efficiency, fostering student confidence, and aligning educational practices with industry standards.

projects.title: S.H.I.M.P.S.
projects.description: S.H.I.M.P.S. stands for Smart Handpump Integrated to Motor Powered with Solar. It is an extension for regular hand pump which converts it into a smart handpump with the help of various devices and mechanisms. We have attached a DC pump powered by solar energy with the help of pipes to the hand pump which automates the water-pumping process of the hand pump.We have also attached TDS sensor with the help of Arduino UNO to the pump to keep a check if the water is potable or not. We aim to provide the luxury of technology to the people in rural area and make their lives easier at a lower cost than digging new borewells.

detailed_profile.name: Somendra Singh Jadon
detailed_profile.position: Business Strategy and Product Development | Groww | IIT Delhi
detailed_profile.about: I am an Assistant Manager, Credit at Groww, India's leading online investment platform, where I leverage my analytical and data skills to build and optimize collection strategies for digital lending products. With over a year of experience in the fintech sector, I have worked on various aspects of credit, strategy, and corporate development, contributing to Groww's rapid growth and expansion. Prior to my current role, I was a Business Associate at Groww, where I worked on M&A deals and strategic funding of fintech startups, as well as building collection strategy for digital lending. I hold a dual degree (B.Tech & M.Tech) in Chemical Engineering from Indian Institute of Technology, Delhi, where I developed my problem-solving and technical abilities. I am passionate about creating innovative and scalable solutions that empower millions of Indians to achieve their financial goals.

detailed_profile.name: Priya Harwani
detailed_profile.position: Startup Investments, Strategy, M&A at Groww
detailed_profile.about: I'm currently working with Groww under the Corporate Development Team which looks after Startup Investments, Merger & Acquisitions and other Strategic Opportunities primarily in FinTech space. Groww is Indiaʼs fastest growing investment platform. Our long term vision to become the trusted money partner of ~100M Indians with core products in investment & banking. Groww was founded in 2016 by alums from Flipkart, ICICI, IITB, IITD, BITs Pilani and is backed by marquee investors like Tiger Global, Sequoia Capital, Ribbit Captial, and Y Combinator. If you're building interesting things specially in FinTech or want to discuss something cool, feel free to reach out at pharwani@groww.in

detailed_profile.name: Sameer Rakheja
detailed_profile.position: Walmart || Zerodha || Groww || HR Operations Specialist at Walmart || Employee-Centric Payroll Solutions || Building Lasting Relationships || Driving Client Value & Growth
detailed_profile.about: I am an HR Operations professional currently contributing to Walmart's Payroll Management team. My focus is on delivering accurate, compliant, and positive payroll experiences for employees. This includes managing end-to-end payroll operations, resolving discrepancies, and overseeing data dissemination and reporting to optimize operational efficiency. I'm committed to continuous improvement, actively training and upskilling in advanced payroll technologies, including PayActiv, Gen AI, and Workday Integration, to enhance automation and precision. I hold a Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, which provides a strong foundation in business principles and practices. Prior to Walmart, I gained valuable experience in client service and operations during a year at Groww Investment Technologies, where I provided investment guidance and client support. I also served as an Assistant Manager at Zerodha Broking Limited, specializing in quality assurance, derivatives, and market indices. My background also includes experience in customer engagement and marketing, honed through roles at Bronze Salon and Spa and Settl Co-Living Spaces, where I developed skills in customer relations and content creation.

experience.title: Associate Specialist - HR Operations

At Walmart, I manage end-to-end payroll operations, ensuring accuracy, compliance, and a smooth experience for employees. I handle discrepancies, streamline reporting, and help drive efficiency across HR processes.

matched.match_rationale: Both are involved in HR operations with a focus on employee-centric solutions. Sameer has experience in payroll solutions which overlaps with HR policies and employee relations.

detailed_profile.name: Sameer Rakheja
detailed_profile.position: Walmart || Zerodha || Groww || HR Operations Specialist at Walmart || Employee-Centric Payroll Solutions || Building Lasting Relationships || Driving Client Value & Growth
detailed_profile.about: I am an HR Operations professional currently contributing to Walmart's Payroll Management team. My focus is on delivering accurate, compliant, and positive payroll experiences for employees. This includes managing end-to-end payroll operations, resolving discrepancies, and overseeing data dissemination and reporting to optimize operational efficiency. I'm committed to continuous improvement, actively training and upskilling in advanced payroll technologies, including PayActiv, Gen AI, and Workday Integration, to enhance automation and precision. I hold a Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, which provides a strong foundation in business principles and practices. Prior to Walmart, I gained valuable experience in client service and operations during a year at Groww Investment Technologies, where I provided investment guidance and client support. I also served as an Assistant Manager at Zerodha Broking Limited, specializing in quality assurance, derivatives, and market indices. My background also includes experience in customer engagement and marketing, honed through roles at Bronze Salon and Spa and Settl Co-Living Spaces, where I developed skills in customer relations and content creation.

experience.title: Associate Specialist - HR Operations
experience.description:
At Walmart, I manage end-to-end payroll operations, ensuring accuracy, compliance, and a smooth experience for employees. I handle discrepancies, streamline reporting, and help drive efficiency across HR processes.


To improve payroll quality, I regularly upskill and work with tools like PayActiv, Gen AI, and Workday Integration, bringing in automation and precision to support both operational excellence and employee satisfaction.

experience.description: The functional area of the internship is Planning and Resource Optimization in Issue Deptt. of RBI Patna. The project provides useful insights towards several operational aspects of Currency Chests like revision of the Chests Balance Limit (CBL), better distribution of linked branches among the currency chests, and efficient planning of soiled notes and fresh notes remittances. The project also includes a general study of the currency management system by the central bank of India, i.e. RBI.

projects.title: Drive2YT - Cloud-Powered Video Uploader
projects.description: Developed and deployed a robust Flask web application on Google App Engine, designed to seamlessly upload video files from Google Drive directly to YouTube. This project provided hands-on experience with end-to-end cloud application development and integration with critical Google services. Notably, this application was largely "vibe coded" with the assistance of Gemini 2.5 and Grok 3, leveraging AI for rapid prototyping, debugging, and exploring complex API interactions.

projects.title: Implementation of Six Sigma Methodologies in Machine Lab
projects.description: The Machine Lab at our college serves as an essential practical learning environment for students to master machining processes such as lathe operations. However, operational inefficiencies, high defect rates, excessive material wastage, and time management issues hinder its potential. This project introduces Six Sigma methodologies to address these challenges systematically, focusing on reducing defects by 20%, improving material efficiency by 20%, and reducing task completion time from 45 minutes to 30 minutes. Using the DMAIC (Define, Measure, Analyze, Improve, Control) framework, we identified root causes, developed targeted solutions such as training materials, optimized lab layouts, and implemented self-assessment tools. Early results indicate significant improvements, including a 22% reduction in defects and a 21% decrease in material wastage. This initiative provides a sustainable model for enhancing efficiency, fostering student confidence, and aligning educational practices with industry standards.

projects.title: S.H.I.M.P.S.
projects.description: S.H.I.M.P.S. stands for Smart Handpump Integrated to Motor Powered with Solar. It is an extension for regular hand pump which converts it into a smart handpump with the help of various devices and mechanisms. We have attached a DC pump powered by solar energy with the help of pipes to the hand pump which automates the water-pumping process of the hand pump.We have also attached TDS sensor with the help of Arduino UNO to the pump to keep a check if the water is potable or not. We aim to provide the luxury of technology to the people in rural area and make their lives easier at a lower cost than digging new borewells.

detailed_profile.name: Somendra Singh Jadon
detailed_profile.position: Business Strategy and Product Development | Groww | IIT Delhi
detailed_profile.about: I am an Assistant Manager, Credit at Groww, India's leading online investment platform, where I leverage my analytical and data skills to build and optimize collection strategies for digital lending products. With over a year of experience in the fintech sector, I have worked on various aspects of credit, strategy, and corporate development, contributing to Groww's rapid growth and expansion. Prior to my current role, I was a Business Associate at Groww, where I worked on M&A deals and strategic funding of fintech startups, as well as building collection strategy for digital lending. I hold a dual degree (B.Tech & M.Tech) in Chemical Engineering from Indian Institute of Technology, Delhi, where I developed my problem-solving and technical abilities. I am passionate about creating innovative and scalable solutions that empower millions of Indians to achieve their financial goals.

detailed_profile.name: Rasika More
detailed_profile.position: Customer Success Executive | Aspiring Equity Research Analyst | Financial Statement Analysis | Investment Strategies | Preparing Research Report | Earnings Report Analysis
detailed_profile.about: I started my career with Sharekhan as a Mutual Fund Specialist, where I developed a solid foundation in financial markets. Currently, I am working as a Senior Customer Success Executive at Groww, gaining valuable insights into Stock market and market dynamics. My interest in equity research began during my first job, fueling my passion to go deeper into the field. To build relevant skills, I recently completed an equity research cohort from The Valuation School, equipping me with expertise in financial statement analysis, valuation and industry analysis. As part of my learning journey, I have prepared a detailed equity research report, demonstrating my ability to analyze companies and market trends comprehensively. I am committed to continuously expanding my knowledge by staying updated with industry developments and improving my analytical abilities. I am keen to connect with finance professionals, exchange insights, and explore opportunities in equity research. I aspire to contribute to the field by leveraging my skills and passion for uncovering investment opportunities and delivering value-driven research.

detailed_profile.name: Rasika More
detailed_profile.position: Customer Success Executive | Aspiring Equity Research Analyst | Financial Statement Analysis | Investment Strategies | Preparing Research Report | Earnings Report Analysis
detailed_profile.about: I started my career with Sharekhan as a Mutual Fund Specialist, where I developed a solid foundation in financial markets. Currently, I am working as a Senior Customer Success Executive at Groww, gaining valuable insights into Stock market and market dynamics. My interest in equity research began during my first job, fueling my passion to go deeper into the field. To build relevant skills, I recently completed an equity research cohort from The Valuation School, equipping me with expertise in financial statement analysis, valuation and industry analysis. As part of my learning journey, I have prepared a detailed equity research report, demonstrating my ability to analyze companies and market trends comprehensively. I am committed to continuously expanding my knowledge by staying updated with industry developments and improving my analytical abilities. I am keen to connect with finance professionals, exchange insights, and explore opportunities in equity research. I aspire to contribute to the field by leveraging my skills and passion for uncovering investment opportunities and delivering value-driven research.

experience.

customer support.

publications.title: Synthesizing Heap Manipulations via Integer Linear Programming
publications.subtitle: Springer
publications.description: Writing heap manipulating programs is hard. Even though the high-level algorithms may be simple, it is often tedious to express them using low-level operations. We present a new tool — Synlip — that uses expression of intent in the form of concrete examples drawn using box-and-arrow diagrams to synthesize heap-manipulations automatically. Instead of modeling the concrete examples in a monolithic manner, Synlip attempts to extract a set of patterns of manipulation that can be applied repeatedly to construct such programs. It, then, attempts to infer these patterns as linear transformations, leveraging the power of ILP solvers for program synthesis.In contrast to many current tools, Synlip does not need a bound on the number of statements and the number of temporaries to be used in the desired program. Also, it is almost insensitive to the size of the concrete examples and, thus, tends to be scalable. Synlip was found to be quite fast; it takes less than 10 seconds for most of our benchmark tasks spanning data-structures like singly and doubly linked-lists, AVL trees and binary search trees.

experience.description: The functional area of the internship is Planning and Resource Optimization in Issue Deptt. of RBI Patna. The project provides useful insights towards several operational aspects of Currency Chests like revision of the Chests Balance Limit (CBL), better distribution of linked branches among the currency chests, and efficient planning of soiled notes and fresh notes remittances. The project also includes a general study of the currency management system by the central bank of India, i.e. RBI.

matched.match_rationale: Sameer Rakheja is an HR Operations Specialist at Groww with experience in employee-centric payroll solutions, which overlaps significantly with HR Management and Employee Engagement.

detailed_profile.name: Sameer Rakheja
detailed_profile.position: Walmart || Zerodha || Groww || HR Operations Specialist at Walmart || Employee-Centric Payroll Solutions || Building Lasting Relationships || Driving Client Value & Growth
detailed_profile.about: I am an HR Operations professional currently contributing to Walmart's Payroll Management team. My focus is on delivering accurate, compliant, and positive payroll experiences for employees. This includes managing end-to-end payroll operations, resolving discrepancies, and overseeing data dissemination and reporting to optimize operational efficiency. I'm committed to continuous improvement, actively training and upskilling in advanced payroll technologies, including PayActiv, Gen AI, and Workday Integration, to enhance automation and precision. I hold a Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, which provides a strong foundation in business principles and practices. Prior to Walmart, I gained valuable experience in client service and operations during a year at Groww Investment Technologies, where I provided investment guidance and client support. I also served as an Assistant Manager at Zerodha Broking Limited, specializing in quality assurance, derivatives, and market indices. My background also includes experience in customer engagement and marketing, honed through roles at Bronze Salon and Spa and Settl Co-Living Spaces, where I developed skills in customer relations and content creation.

experience.title: Associate Specialist - HR Operations
experience.description:
At Walmart, I manage end-to-end payroll operations, ensuring accuracy, compliance, and a smooth experience for employees. I handle discrepancies, streamline reporting, and help drive efficiency across HR processes.


To improve payroll quality, I regularly upskill and work with tools like PayActiv, Gen AI, and Workday Integration, bringing in automation and precision to support both operational excellence and employee satisfaction.

matched.match_rationale: Both have strong expertise in Digital Marketing, although Mrinmoy focuses more on SEO and Digital PR.

detailed_profile.name: Mrinmoy Mishra
detailed_profile.about: Results-driven SEO Specialist with 1.5+ years of experience in technical SEO, on-page and off-page optimization, and content strategy. Proven track record of increasing organic traffic and keyword rankings for fintech and product-based companies. My passion lies in building SEO strategies that don’t just chase rankings but drive measurable business outcomes — revenue, conversions, and long-term brand authority. I lead the end-to-end SEO strategy and execution for five high-impact categories, collaborating closely with the CMO, app optimization agencies, developers, and content teams. My approach is rooted in data-driven decision making, integrating technical excellence with content strategy and UX alignment to maximize organic performance. Proven results: Increased organic revenue by 15.13% within just 30 days Achieved a 12.94% boost in conversion on a focused in-house SEO initiative Consistently deliver scalable improvements in traffic quality and lead generation Core strengths & tools: Technical SEO audits, Core Web Vitals optimization & structured data implementation Content mapping aligned to user intent and funnel stages Advanced keyword strategy, on-page optimization, schema markup GSC, GA4, Screaming Frog, SEMrush, Ahrefs, GTM, Google Ads What differentiates me is a holistic, audit-led mindset: beyond crawl reports, I diagnose real growth levers — from index bloat, cannibalization, and link gap analysis to UI/UX enhancements and content opportunities. My strategies blend Generative Engine Optimization (GEO), Answer Engine Optimization (AEO), and AI-powered automation, ensuring brands stay visible in an evolving search landscape. Previously, I’ve worked with high-traffic media websites, B2B SaaS, and local SEO clients, growing organic traffic from thousands to millions per month and increasing revenue exponentially. I thrive at the intersection of SEO, user experience, and business strategy, translating complex data into actionable insights that stakeholders can trust. If you’d like to connect about advanced SEO, AI-led growth strategies, or turning organic search into a predictable revenue channel — let’s talk.

detailed_profile.name: Sameer Rakheja
detailed_profile.position: Walmart || Zerodha || Groww || HR Operations Specialist at Walmart || Employee-Centric Payroll Solutions || Building Lasting Relationships || Driving Client Value & Growth
detailed_profile.about: I am an HR Operations professional currently contributing to Walmart's Payroll Management team. My focus is on delivering accurate, compliant, and positive payroll experiences for employees. This includes managing end-to-end payroll operations, resolving discrepancies, and overseeing data dissemination and reporting to optimize operational efficiency. I'm committed to continuous improvement, actively training and upskilling in advanced payroll technologies, including PayActiv, Gen AI, and Workday Integration, to enhance automation and precision. I hold a Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, which provides a strong foundation in business principles and practices. Prior to Walmart, I gained valuable experience in client service and operations during a year at Groww Investment Technologies, where I provided investment guidance and client support. I also served as an Assistant Manager at Zerodha Broking Limited, specializing in quality assurance, derivatives, and market indices. My background also includes experience in customer engagement and marketing, honed through roles at Bronze Salon and Spa and Settl Co-Living Spaces, where I developed skills in customer relations and content creation.

detailed_profile.about: I am an Assistant Manager, Credit at Groww, India's leading online investment platform, where I leverage my analytical and data skills to build and optimize collection strategies for digital lending products. I hold a dual degree (B.Tech & M.Tech) in Chemical Engineering from Indian Institute of Technology, Delhi, where I developed my problem-solving and technical abilities. I am passionate about creating innovative and scalable solutions that empower millions of Indians to achieve their financial goals.

detailed_profile.about: I am an expert in Customer Service Support who has been in the market for 3 and half years. I have completed my Bachelors degree in Bioanalytical Science. I completed My NISM courses and apart from this I do trading in market. I was born in Maharashtra (Mumbai), grew up in Mumbai City. I am super Desi when it comes to Cricket and Bollywood. Currently, I am working With Groww and disrupt the fitness industry. My job is to Deal with Customer for their queries in Stock, Mutual fund and many different things. I love my job! I hang out with a lot of people with different field. I am a Gym Freak person. I regularly attend different event meetups. I do not like pushy people. If you are nice, I will go out of my way to help you. I like to treat people with respect. I enjoy helping people and I love to learn about new technologies… Story of my life :) States travelled by me:- Karnataka, Delhi, Bihar, Gujarat, Goa, Kerala, Uttar Pradesh
